meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Carol Hansen Pete Vanderhyden James Holzhauer Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7985.

td.p: Carol Hansen, a retired database administrator from San Francisco, California
Pete Vanderhyden, an airline pilot from Murrieta, California
James Holzhauer, a professional sports gambler from Las Vegas, Nevada (whose 21-day cash winnings total $1,608,627)

tr.td: TV SHOWS BY COUPLE
BEGINS & ENDS WITH "W"
CLASSIC LITERATURE
(Alex: And then in honor of tomorrow's date, "May the 4th be with you"...)
SCI-FI STUFF
NOBODY EXPECTS
THE SPINACH ACQUISITION

a streaker

James
')

Pete
